enableSheetEnhancements.name: Enable STA Officers Log Sheet Enhancements
enableSheetEnhancements.hint: If disabled, this module will not modify the STA character sheet UI on this client (no added buttons, sorting, link controls, or delete confirmations).

showLogUsedToggle.name: Show 'Used' toggle on Logs
showLogUsedToggle.hint: Advanced. Shows the strike-through toggle on Log entries. Normally hidden to prevent accidental changes; 'used' is managed automatically by callback links.

groupShip.name: Group Ship
groupShip.hint: Choose a Starship actor to be treated as the party's Group Ship (stored for later automation).

playerAmbientAudioSelectionOnly.name: Player Ambient Audio Uses Selected Tokens
playerAmbientAudioSelectionOnly.hint: If enabled, non-GM users only hear ambient audio near tokens they currently have selected/controlled (matching GM behavior). If disabled, Foundry's default behavior applies (players hear audio near all owned tokens).

autoCallbackOnDeterminationRoll.name: Auto-prompt Callback on Determination Rolls
autoCallbackOnDeterminationRoll.hint: If enabled, the GM client will scan new STA roll chat messages for 'Determination', automatically spend 1 Determination for the rolling character, and prompt the player to make a Callback.

talentPickerCustomCompendium.name: Talent Picker: Extra Compendium
talentPickerCustomCompendium.hint: Optional compendium pack id to include in the Talent picker (e.g. module-name.talents-homebrew).

focusPickerCustomCompendium.name: Focus Picker: Extra Compendium
focusPickerCustomCompendium.hint: Optional compendium pack id to include in the Focus picker (e.g. module-name.focuses-homebrew).

Starfleet Regulations

useValue.title: Use Value: {value}
useValue.positiveDesc:
Use it to help you succeed.
  • -1 Determination
  • Before rolling for a free critical success
  • After rolling to reroll any dice.
useValue.negativeDesc:
Use it against yourself.
  • +1 Determination
  • Cause a Complication
useValue.challengeDesc:
Change who you are.
  • +1 Determination
  • Value becomes Challenged.
  • Rewrite the value at the end of the mission to remove the Challenged status.

useDirective.title: Use Directive
useDirective.missing: Enter a directive or choose one from the list.

chooseMilestoneBenefit.giveToSupportingCharacter: Give the benefit to a Supporting Character

chooseMilestoneBenefit.manualConfirmHint: This module will not automate this choice. Click Confirm after you have applied it manually.
chooseMilestoneBenefit.supportingCharacterHelp: You may give this milestone benefit to a Supporting Character instead of your main character.
chooseMilestoneBenefit.shipHelp: You may refit your ship as a milestone benefit.
chooseMilestoneBenefit.shipHelpBullet1: Increase 1 Ship System or Department and decrease another (as allowed by your table rules).
chooseMilestoneBenefit.shipHelpBullet2: Or replace one Ship Talent with a new Ship Talent (as allowed by your table rules).
chooseMilestoneBenefit.arcShipSystemHelp: Increase the selected Ship System by +1 on the ship sheet. This can only be chosen once per system.
chooseMilestoneBenefit.arcShipDepartmentHelp: Increase the selected Ship Department by +1 on the ship sheet. This can only be chosen once per department.
chooseMilestoneBenefit.arcShipTalentHelp: Add a new Ship Talent on the ship sheet.
